input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Timex Men's Watch Waterbury Chronograph TW2V42500VQ'
  - Name='Citizen Garrison Military Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD61 Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Promaster Skyhawk A-T Eco-Drive Men's Watch | JY8156-00L'
  - Name='Citizens ProMaster'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Military Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Promaster Geo Trekker Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's SRPG29 5 Sports Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco Drive Promaster Snowbirds Skyhawk A-T Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Chronograph Eco-Drive Dial Men's Watch CA4500-91'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Skyhawk A-T JY8084-09H Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Promaster Eco Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Eco Drive Men's Promaster Dive CA0825-05A'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Eco Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Classic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster BN0085-01E'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco Drive Brown Leather Chandler Watch BM8478-01L'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Promaster Radio Controlled World Time Eco-Drive Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk A-T Limited Edition Eco-Drive Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Promaster Navihawk A-T Eco-Drive Men's Watch CA4660-61A'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Sport Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Dive Ecozilla Eco-Drive Watch BJ8057-09X'
  - Name='Citizen Tactical BM8595-08H'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports Field Sports Style Automatic Winding Men's Type SBSA117'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Watch Waterbury Chronograph TW2V42500VQ
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are Timex watches intended for everyday wear with some durability; however, the Waterbury is a chronograph with likely larger, less rugged case and less focus on adventure features compared to the expedition titanium's robust titanium, shock resistance, and 200m water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Garrison Military Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a military-style watch like the Expedition Scout, likely rugged, designed for outdoor use; although no titanium or exact features given, Citizen's military watch aligns closely in purpose and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD61 Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seiko 5 Sports line includes durable and sport-oriented watches, automatic movement, and likely similar case size; less specified for extreme durability or titanium case but similar rugged sport watch category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Promaster Skyhawk A-T Eco-Drive Men's Watch | JY8156-00L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Promaster Skyhawk is a complex aviation watch with additional functions and larger case, targeting different niche from simple rugged daily adventure watch like Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizens ProMaster
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Promaster line includes rugged dive and adventure watches; without exact model details, generally aligns on durability and outdoor focus though may be more specialized.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Military Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A military-style automatic watch geared for durability and everyday ruggedness, closely matching the adventure and sport essence of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Promaster Geo Trekker Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Geo Trekker is designed for outdoor adventure, combining durability, reliable quartz Eco-Drive, and functional features, similar purpose and rugged construction as reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's SRPG29 5 Sports Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another model in Seiko 5 Sports line emphasizing durable sport watch qualities; lacks details on titanium or shock resistance but generally compatible rugged watch category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco Drive Promaster Snowbirds Skyhawk A-T Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aviation themed Skyhawk with advanced functions, likely bulkier and more technical than simple adventure/scout watch; different segment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Chronograph Eco-Drive Dial Men's Watch CA4500-91
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph function suggests more complex dial and use case different from simple expedition watch; possibly less focused on rugged adventure use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Skyhawk A-T JY8084-09H Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar reasoning as other Skyhawk models; more technical pilot watch, differing in core function and user compared to expedition style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Promaster Eco Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Promaster Eco series generally designed for durability and outdoor activities, aligns moderately with reference's adventure focus, though specifics unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco Drive Men's Promaster Dive CA0825-05A
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As a dive watch with high water resistance and rugged construction, it is functionally close to the Expedition in terms of durability and outdoor utility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Eco Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same general series as earlier Promaster Eco models; suits outdoor/adventure use, aligning with the reference watch's purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Classic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic line implies dressier styling and less focus on rugged features or high water resistance; less relevant to expedition style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster BN0085-01E
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Well-known rugged dive model with significant water resistance and durable design, very close in purpose and robustness to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco Drive Brown Leather Chandler Watch BM8478-01L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chandler line often blends casual and outdoors, with leather strap is less focused on titanium or shock resistance but appeals to similar consumers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph function and less specified rugged construction make this less aligned with the simple durable expedition style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Promaster Radio Controlled World Time Eco-Drive Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Advanced features like radio control and world time add complexity and specialized use, differing from simple, robust expedition use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk A-T Limited Edition Eco-Drive Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Navihawk is a multifunction pilot-style watch, with more complexity and differentiated user case from the reference rugged adventure watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Promaster Navihawk A-T Eco-Drive Men's Watch CA4660-61A
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to other Navihawks: sophisticated functionality rather than simple rugged expedition, hence lower relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Sport Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport chronograph offers some ruggedness but added complications and likely less titanium or ultra-durable case differentiates it.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Dive Ecozilla Eco-Drive Watch BJ8057-09X
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Known for extreme robustness and high water resistance, this watch is very closely aligned with the durable, adventure-ready nature of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Tactical BM8595-08H
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tactical line implies military styling and ruggedness similar to expedition model; likely shares shock resistance and durable construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports Field Sports Style Automatic Winding Men's Type SBSA117
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field style and automatic winding watch focused on durability and outdoor use, closely paralleling the expedition watch's spirit and function.
